item.title: Go HTTP Middleware
item.description: I was working on an HTML website for a Go project and like always, I started by extending the NGINX image, but then it hit me… what if I replaced NGINX with Go’s HTTP server?! Immediately after trying out this profane idea I run into an issue where by default you don’t get any HTTP logging facilities, but luckily this is very easy to correct using (you guessed it!
